Deemos awoke and found out that Artist again saved him, and Airbomber as we=
ll. Inzola was repaired, but nowhere to be seen. Deemos thanked Artist and =
ran off to find Inzola. He peeped into Stranato's room to ask him if he see=
n her but seen they were kissing. He closed the door. He thought about it a=
nd became furious. He smashed the door open and fired repeatedly at the 2 o=
f them. They fleed, taking minor damage from Stranato's bad aiming, and man=
aged to escape the base.

"I'll get you, Inzola! I'll get you and your wuss=
 boyfriend!!!" Deemos yelled. Airbomber walked by Deemos to find Infectra. =
Deemos shot him in the shoulder and sent him spiraling to the ground. Deemo=
s poured his heart out to Artist later on.

"You know, Plintissa thinks you=
 were wronged, I want to side with YOU." Artist said to Deemos.

"Plintissa=
 who? Never mind, we can be partners Artist, partners...in crime and herois=
m." Deemos said. He and Artist shook hands. Artist didn't know what he was =
getting into, but he was glad to be helping someone.

Stranato and Inzola c=
leared the Maximal base, sat down and started kissing again, Stranato whisp=
ering in her ear that Deemos would have killed her had she not came with hi=
m, even if she never met Stranato.

A stasis pod falls right next to the Ma=
ximal base and opens...
